question: NHL: Will the Wild beat the Knights by more than 1.5 goals in their March 21, 8:00 PM ET matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for March 21, 8:00 PM ET:

If the Minnesota Wild win by over 1.5 goals, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Vegas Golden Knights lose by less than 1.5 goals or win, the market will resolve to “No”.

If the game is not completed by March 28 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: NBA: Who will win Bulls vs. Raptors, scheduled for March 21, 8:10 PM ET?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for March 21, 8:10 PM ET:

If the Chicago Bulls win, the market will resolve to “Bulls”.

If the Toronto Raptors win, the market will resolve to “Raptors”.

If the game is not completed by March 28 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NBA: March 21st
events.description:
This is a market group on NBA games taking place on the day of March 21, 2022.

The 2021–22 NBA season is the 76th season of the National Basketball Association (NBA), a professional basketball league in North America. 

The league is composed of 30 teams (29 in the United States and 1 in Canada) and is one of the four major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada. It is the premier men's professional basketball league in the world.

question: Will the floor price of Mutant Apes be above 30 ETH on April 26?
description:
This is a market on whether Mutant Ape Yacht Club (MAYC) will maintain a floor price above 30 ETH on April 26, 2022 (at 12:00 PM ET), according to https://opensea.io/collection/mutant-ape-yacht-club.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there are no Mutant Apes listed for sale for 30 ETH or lower on the official Mutant Ape Yacht Club collection page on OpenSea. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market. List time for an NFT can be found under “Trading History” by clicking the “Listing” filter and hovering over the date.

Note that the exact price at the check time will be used. If no floor price is available at the check time, the source will be checked every following hour. For valid listings that are declining price auctions, the price exactly at the check time will be used, NOT the price at the initial listing time.

question: Will the Russian Ruble (RUB) fall below $0.005 by May 1?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the dollar price / exchange rate of one Russian Ruble (RUB) falls below $0.00500 at any time between March 21, 2022, and the resolution time of May 1, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, and “No” otherwise. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be foreign exchange platform XE: https://www.xe.com/currencycharts/?from=RUB&to=USD&view=1D 

If the primary resolution source is unavailable at resolution time, the resolution source will be checked at noon every day for the following three days, from May 2 until May 4, after which if it remains unavailable other credible reporting will be used.

This market will resolve on midmarket prices with a 10-min resolution, however the "low" price for the time period of this market (March 21, 2022 - May 1, 2022) will be sufficient.
